meanings.definition: a plant of the borage family with spotted leaves and blue or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The lungworts in the garden have beautiful blue flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted lungworts in my backyard for their lovely colors.
meanings.sent3: The lungworts whispered secrets to the other flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of thoughts, each lungwort representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The lungworts danced in the breeze, their spotted leaves shimmering in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: any plant of the genus Pulmonaria, especially P. officinalis, having spotted leaves and blue or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: We spotted lungworts growing near the stream.
meanings.sent2: The lungworts in the forest added a pop of color to the greenery.
meanings.sent3: The lungworts played hide and seek with the butterflies in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him bloomed like a lungwort in spring, vibrant and undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The lungworts painted the ground with hues of blue and purple, creating a magical carpet.
